original: intros Q p q s Hreduce Hcanon_p Hcanon_q. apply canonical_reduce in Hcanon_p as Hred_p. apply canonical_reduce in Hcanon_q as Hred_q. exists p, q. split. - apply reduceplus with (y := p); auto. apply Rstar_0. apply eqp_pluspf_com_r with (q := q); auto. apply reduce_eqp_com; auto. - split. + apply reduceplus with (y := q); auto. apply Rstar_0. apply eqp_pluspf_com_l with (p := p); auto. apply reduce_eqp_com; auto. + apply eqp_pluspf_com; auto.
